name: FILLET OF SEABASS
description: Pan fried seabass fillets served with king prawns, baby prawns and fresh mussels, all topped with a light white wine, lemon and garlic sauce.

name: FILLET OF SALMON
description: Scottish salmon fillets served with king prawns, baby prawns and fresh mussels cooked with a creamy English mustard sauce.

name: SALMON LAKSA CURRY
description: A Scottish salmon fillet served with baby and king prawns in a rich curry sauce served with mixed vegetables

name: MIXED SEAFOOD PLATTER
description: Fillet of seabass, fillet of salmon, half lobster, king prawns, mussels in white wine and garlic sauce.

name: MEDITERRANEAN SEABASS
description: Seabass fillet, infused with olives, garlic and sweet red onions. Enhanced by sundried tomatoes, aubergine, fresh Thai chilli and cherry tomatoes. This dish is simmered in a Napoli sauce.
